incidents.name: App Functions issues

incident_updates.body:
5:45 AM MDT –9:15 AM MDT

5:45 AM MDT – 9:15 AM MDT

We identified an issue in our App Functions system that caused some function executions to fail due to a misconfiguration. The issue has since been mitigated, and functionality has been restored.

incidents.name: "Duplicate key" errors when attempting to update Content

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We have deployed a fix for this issue and are monitoring the results. Customer should no longer be experiencing these types of "duplicate key" errors.

We have identified an issue which was introduced in the past week where a small subset of customer requests are receiving the following error: 
"duplicate key value violates unique constraint "draft_entries_fts_space_id_entry_id_locale_unique": duplicate key value violates unique constraint "draft_entries_fts_space_id_entry_id_locale_unique". 
We have narrowed down the root cause and are working on a fix for the issue.
